caption.title: Geographic projections of species distribution models of Pinus pinaster (P. pin; a-c) and pitch canker disease (Disease; d-f).
caption.p: Current climate projections are shown in probabilistic projections, where the values oscillate between 0 to 100—a) and d)—and in binary projections, restricted to 0 or 1 values—b) and e). Future suitability maps summarizing 18 future climate predictions are shown in c) and f).
